name: @porsche-design-system/react
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:react-wrapper && yarn build:react-ssr-wrapper && yarn build:ag-grid && yarn build:uxpin-wrapper
scripts.build:typings: DEST=./dist/react-wrapper && SRC=$DEST/esm && mv $SRC/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts $DEST/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/jsdom-polyfill && mv $SRC/partials/index.d.ts $DEST/partials/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/partials && mv $SRC/ag-grid/index.d.ts $DEST/ag-grid/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/ag-grid && mv $SRC/styles/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/esm/index.d.ts && mv $SRC/styles/vanilla-extract/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/vanilla-extract/esm/vanilla-extract/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/styles && mv $SRC/testing/index.d.ts $DEST/testing/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/testing
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt
scripts.test:unit: yarn test:unit:react-wrapper && yarn test:unit:react-ssr-wrapper && yarn test:unit:uxpin-wrapper
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf ./dist && yarn --cwd projects/nextjs clean:build && yarn --cwd projects/remix clean:build && yarn --cwd projects/uxpin-wrapper clean:build
